name: Project: Absolution
description:
Built in Haxe using HaxeFlixel and a lot of back pain.

Absolve yourself or face the gallows. This is your ultimate quest.

You were convicted of a heinous murder, but it wasn't you. Instead you escaped the prisons and set about gathering the evidence proving otherwise, but don't stay still for too long or the guards will catch up to you.

Find all the pages of evidence and absolve yourself.

DON'T LET THE TRUE MURDERER ESCAPE!
